trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kilgore
There were no other sightings in Kilgore on or around July 15th 2012
Summary: Looked like a stationary star, then sped off.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the car with family member and was looking through the windshield at the stars. Nothing seemed abnormal. No planes, no blinking towers, nothing. suddenly, i see a flash from one of the star like objects, which drew my attention. I caught sight of it just as it began to speed off. i just joked at the time saying, "Randa, i think we just saw a UFO." But i have been thinking about it quite a bit lately... what if it was?
